casebody.data:
NOONSOB
v.
STATE OF NC 131P16-8 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2018 Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ms. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

Mr. Somchoi Noonsab, For Noonsab, Somchoi

Mr. Somchoi Noorsob, For Noorsob, Somchoi *241The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of April 2018 by Defendant for Review of Constitutional Questions:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."
